summary: Arizona is a state in the southwestern United States, bordering Mexico and several other states. It's the 6th largest state by area and 14th in population, with Phoenix as its capital and largest city. Arizona became a state in 1912, the last of the contiguous states to join the Union. It has a diverse climate, from desert in the south to forests and canyons in the north. The state is home to many Native American tribes and has a growing Hispanic population. Arizona's economy has expanded since the 1950s, attracting large companies and becoming a political swing state.
title: Arizona
